Name: Percent of Team's 3 Point Field Goals Attempted
Definition: The percentage of a team's 3 point field goals attempted that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's 3 Point Field Goals Made
Definition: The percentage of a team's 3 point field goals that a player has made while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Assists
Definition: The percentage of a team's assists that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Blocks
Definition: The percentage of a team's blocks that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Blocked Field Goal Attempts
Definition: The percentage of a team's own blocked field goal attempts that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Defensive Rebounds
Definition: The percentage of a team's defensive rebounds that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Field Goals Attempted
Definition: The percentage of a team's field goals attempted that a player has attempted while on the court

Name: Percent of Field Goals Attempted (2 Pointers)
Definition: The percentage of field goals attempted by a player or team that are 2 pointers

Name: Percent of Field Goals Attempted (3 Pointers)
Definition: The percentage of field goals attempted by a player or team that are 3 pointers

Name: Percent of Team's Field Goals Made
Definition: The percentage of a team's made field goals that a player has made while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Free Throws Attempted
Definition: The percentage of a team's free throws attempted that a player has attempted while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Free Throws Made
Definition: The percentage of a team's made free throws that a player has made while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Offensive Rebounds
Definition: The percentage of a team's offensive rebounds that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Personal Fouls
Definition: The percentage of a team's personal fouls that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Personal Fouls Drawn
Definition: The percentage of a team's personal fouls drawn that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Points
Definition: The percentage of a team's points that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Points (2-Point Field Goals)
Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from 2 point field goals

Name: Percent of Points (2-Point Field Goals: Mid Range)
Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are that are from mid-range field goals (2 point field goals from outside the paint)

Name: Percent of Points (3-Point Field Goals)
Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from 3 point field goals

Name: Percent of Points (Fast Break Points)
Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from fast break opportunities

Name: Percent of Points (Free Throws)
Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from free throws

Name: Percent of Points (Off Turnovers)
Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are scored on the possession after forcing an opponent turnover

Name: Percent of Points (Points in the Paint)
Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are scored in the paint

Name: Percent of Team's Steals
Definition: The percentage of a team's steals that a player has while on the court

Name: Percent of Team's Turnovers
Definition: The percentage of a team's turnovers that a player has while on the court

Name: 2 Point Field Goal Frequency
Definition: The percentage of opponent field goal attempts that fit the specified criteria Formula (2FGA)/(FGA)

Name: 2 Point Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goal attempts of a specified criteria that a player or team makes Formula (2FGM)/(2FGA)

Name: 2 Point Field Goals Attempted
Definition: The number of 2 point field goals that a player or team has attempted that fit the specified criteria

Name: 2 Point Field Goals Made
Definition: The number of 2 point field goals that a player or team has made that fit the specified criteria

Name: 2 Pointers Made (Percent Assisted)
Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goals made that are assisted by a teammate

Name: Percent of 2 Point Field Goals Made Assisted
Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goals made by a player or team that are assisted by a teammate

Name: 2 Pointers Made (Percent Unassisted)
Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goals made that are not assisted by a teammate

Name: Percent of 2 Point Field Goals Made Unassisted
Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goals made by a player or team that are not assisted by a teammate

Name: Second Chance Points
Definition: The percentage of isolation plays where a player or team shoots free throws as the result of a shooting foul

Name: 3 Point Field Goal Frequency
Definition: The percentage of opponent field goal attempts of the specified criteria that are 3 point attempts Formula (3FGA)/(FGA)

Name: Percent of 3 Point Field Goals Made Assisted
Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goals made by a player or team that are assisted by a teammate

Name: 3 Pointers Made (Percent Assisted)
Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goals made that are assisted by a teammate

Name: Percent of 3 Point Field Goals Made Unassisted
Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goals made by a player or team that are not assisted by a teammate

Name: 3 Pointers Made (Percent Unassisted)
Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goals made that are not assisted by a teammate

Name: 3 Point Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goal attempts that a player makes Formula (3PM)/(3PA)

Name: 3 Point Field Goals Attempted
Definition: The number of 3 point field goals that a player or team has attempted

Name: 3 Point Field Goals Made
Definition: The number of 3 point field goals that a player or team has made

Name: Plus-Minus
Definition: The point differential when a player or team is on the floor

Name: Adjusted Defensive Rebound Chance Percentage
Definition: Percentage of rebounds gathered when given a rebound chance on defense; excludes all deferred rebounds Formula (DREB)/(DREB Chances - Deferred DREB Chances)

Name: Adjusted Offensive Rebound Chance Percentage
Definition: Percentage of rebounds gathered when given a rebound chance on offense; excludes all deferred rebounds Formula (OREB)/(OREB Chances - Deferred OREB Chances)

Name: Adjusted Rebound Chance Percentage
Definition: Percentage of rebounds gathered when given a rebound chance; excludes all deferred rebounds Formula (REB)/(REB Chances - Deferred REB Chances)

Name: And One Frequency
Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team makes a field goal while also being awarded a free throw attempt due to a shooting foul

Name: Assists
Definition: The number of assists -- passes that lead directly to a made basket -- by a player

Name: Assists Adjusted
Definition: The total sum of a player or team's assists, free throw assists, and secondary assists
Assists by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

Name: Assist Points Created
Definition: Points created by a player or team through their assists

Name: Assist Ratio
Definition: Assist Ratio is the number of assists a player averages per 100 possessions used Formula (AST * 100) / (POSS)

Name: Assist to Pass Percentage
Definition: The percentage of passes by a player or team that are assists Formula (Assists)/(Passes Made)

Name: Assist to Pass Percentage Adjusted
Definition: The percentage of passes by a player or team that are assists, free throw assists, or secondary assists Formula (Adjusted Assists)/(Passes Made)

Name: Assist Percentage
Definition: The percentage of teammate field goals a player assisted on while he was on the floor Formula AST / (TmFGM - FGM)

Name: Assist to Turnover Ratio
Definition: The number of assists for a player or team compared to the number of turnovers they have committed

Name: Average Defensive Rebound Distance
Definition: The average distance of a defensive rebound

Name: Average Dribbles per Touch
Definition: The average number of dribbles a player or team takes per touch

Name: Average Offensive Rebound Distance
Definition: The average distance of an offensive rebound

Name: Average Rebound Distance
Definition: The average distance of a rebound

Name: Average Seconds per Touch
Definition: The average number of seconds per touch by a player or team

Name: Average Speed
Definition: The average speed in miles per hour of all movements (sprinting, jogging, standing, walking) by a player or team while on the court

Name: Average Speed Defense
Definition: The average speed in miles per hour of all movements (sprinting, jogging, standing, walking) by a player or team while on defense

Name: Average Speed Offense
Definition: The average speed in miles per hour of all movements (sprinting, jogging, standing, walking) by a player or team while on offense

Name: Blocks
Definition: A block occurs when an offensive player attempts a shot, and the defense player tips the ball, blocking their chance to score

Name: Blocks Against
Definition: The number of shots attempted by a player or team that are blocked by a defender

Name: Opponent Blocks
Definition: Number of times an opponent has registered a block on the shot of a player or team

Name: Body Fat Percentage
Definition: Body Fat Percentage

Name: Boxouts
Definition: The number of times a player made physical contact with an opponent who was actively pursuing a rebound, showed visible progress or strong effort in disadvantaging the opponent, and successfully prevented that opponent from securing the rebound

Name: Catch Shoot Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on Catch and Shoot shots

Name: Catch Shoot Points
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on Catch and Shoot shots

Name: Charges Drawn
Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team draws a charge
Any touch where the player receives the ball within 5 feet of the basket

Name: College Break Left
Definition: A player takes five shots from the left break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: College Break Right
Definition: A player takes five shots from the right break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: College Corner Left
Definition: A player takes five shots from the left corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: College Corner Right
Definition: A player takes five shots from the right corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: College Top Key
Definition: A player takes five shots from the top of the key. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: Contested 2PT Shots
Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team closes out and raises a hand to contest a 2 point shot prior to its release

Name: Contested 3PT Shots
Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team closes out and raises a hand to contest a 3 point shot prior to its release

Name: Contested Defensive Rebounds
Definition: A defensive rebound where an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder

Name: Contested Defensive Rebound Percentage
Definition: The percentage of defensive rebounds the player collects while an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder Formula (Contested DREB)/(DREB)

Name: Contested Offensive Rebounds
Definition: An offensive rebound where an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder

Name: Contested Offensive Rebound Percentage
Definition: The percentage of offensive rebounds the player collects while an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder Formula (Contested OREB)/(OREB)

Name: Contested Rebounds
Definition: A rebound where an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder

Name: Contested Rebound Percentage
Definition: The percentage of rebounds the player collects while an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder Formula (Contested REB)/(REB)
Any shot where the closest defender is within 3.5 feet

Name: Contested Shots
Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team closes out and raises a hand to contest a shot prior to its release

Name: Contested Field Goals Percentage
Definition: The percentage of field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

Name: Contested Field Goals Attempted
Definition: The number of field goals the opposing players attempted while a defensive player was contesting

Name: Contested Field Goals Made
Definition: The number of field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

Name: Contested Three Pointers Percentage
Definition: The percentage of three-point field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

Name: Contested Three Pointers Attempted
Definition: The number of three-point field goals the opposing players took while a defensive player was contesting

Name: Contested Three Pointers Made
Definition: The number of three-point field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

Name: Double Doubles
Definition: The number of double-doubles (double-digit number total in two of the five categories in a game) a player achieves

Name: Defensive Fouls
Definition: The number of non-shooting defensive fouls a defensive player committed while guarding a specific offensive player

Name: Defensive Matchup Percentage
Definition: The percentage of a defensive player’s overall possessions where he was guarding a specific offensive player

Name: Defensive Win Shares
Definition: Share of wins a player contributes to their team from defense

Name: Deferred Defensive Rebound Chances
Definition: The number of times that a player has a defensive rebound chance, but defers the rebound to a teammate

Name: Deferred Offensive Rebound Chances
Definition: The number of times that a player has an offensive rebound chance, but defers the rebound to a teammate

Name: Deferred Rebounds Chances
Definition: The number of times that a player has a rebound chance, but defers the rebound to a teammate

Name: Deflections
Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team gets his hand on the ball on a non-shot attempt

Name: Defensive Rating
Definition: The number of points allowed per 100 possessions by a team. For a player, it is the number of points per 100 possessions that the team allows while that individual player is on the court Formula 100*((Opp Points)/(Opp POSS))

Name: Deterrent Factor
Definition: The percentage of a player’s season average FGA output per Possession that he shot in a specific matchup Formula ((Matchup FGA)/Matchup Possessions)/(Player’s Season Average FGA per Possession)

Name: Defended Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The opponents field goal percentage on shots when the player is defending the shot Formula (DFGM)/(DFGA)

Name: Field Goals Defended at Rim Percent
Definition: Percentage of field goal attempts the opponent makes while the player or team was defending the rim Formula (DFGM)/(DFGA)

Name: Field Goals Defended at Rim Attempted
Definition: Field goals attempted by the opponent while the player or team was defending the rim

Name: Defended Field Goals Attempted
Definition: The number of opponents shots attempted when a player or team is defending the shot

Name: Field Goals Defended at Rim Made
Definition: Field goals made by the opponent while the player or team was defending the rim

Name: Defended Field Goals Made
Definition: The number of opponents shots when a player or team is defending the shot

Name: Percentage Points Difference
Definition: The difference between the normal percentage of a shooter on shots throughout the season and the percentage on shots when the defensive player or team is guarding the shooter. A good defensive number will be negative because the defensive player holds their opponent to a lower percentage than normal Formula FG% - DFG%

Name: Distance Feet
Definition: Distance run by a player or team measured in feet

Name: Distance Miles
Definition: Distance run by a player or team measured in miles Formula (Dist. Feet)/5280

Name: Distance Miles Defense
Definition: Miles run by a player or team while on defense

Name: Distance Miles Offense
Definition: Miles run by a player or team while on offense

Name: Defensive Rebounds
Definition: The number of rebounds a player or team has collected while they were on defense

Name: Defensive Rebounds Chance Percentage
Definition: The percentage of defensive rebounds a player recovers compared to the number of defensive rebounding chances Formula (DREB)/(DREB Chances)

Name: Defensive Rebound Chances
Definition: When on defense, a player has a defensive rebound chance if they are the closest player to the ball at any point in time between when the ball has crossed below the rim to when it is fully rebounded

Name: Defensive Rebounding Percentage
Definition: The percentage of available defensive rebounds a player or team obtains while on the floor.

Name: Drive Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The field goal percentage of a player or team on drives to the basket

Name: Drive Points
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on drives to the basket

Name: Drives
Definition: When a player attacks the basket off the dribble in the halfcourt offense. Does not include situations where the player starts close to the basket, catches on the move, or immediately gets cut off on the perimeter

Name: Effective Field Goal Percentage
Definition: Measures field goal percentage adjusting for made 3-point field goals being 1.5 times more valuable than made 2-point field goals. Formula ((FGM + (0.5 * 3PM)) / FGA
Any touch where the player receives the ball near the free throw line

Name: Elbow Touch FG%
Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on touches at the elbow

Name: Elbow Touch Points
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on touches at the elbow

Name: Fast Break Points
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team while on a fast break

Name: Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The percentage of field goal attempts that a player makes Formula (FGM)/(FGA)

Name: Field Goals Attempted
Definition: The number of field goals that a player or team has attempted. This includes both 2 pointers and 3 pointers
Field Goal Attempts by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

Name: Field Goals Made
Definition: The number of field goals that a player or team has made. This includes both 2 pointers and 3 pointers

Name: Field Goals Made (Assisted)
Definition: The percentage of field goals made that are assisted by a teammate

Name: Percent of Field Goals Made Assisted
Definition: The percentage of total field goals made by a player or team that are assisted by a teammate

Name: Percent of Field Goals Made Unassisted
Definition: The percentage of total field goals made by a player or team that are not assisted by a teammate

Name: Field Goals Made (Unassisted)
Definition: The percentage of field goals made that are not assisted by a teammate

Name: Fifteen Break Left
Definition: A player takes five shots from the left break and 15 feet away from the basket

Name: Fifteen Break Right
Definition: A player takes five shots from the right break and 15 feet away from the basket

Name: Fifteen Corner Left
Definition: A player takes five shots from the left baseline and 15 feet away from the basket

Name: Fifteen Corner Right
Definition: A player takes five shots from the right baseline and 15 feet away from the basket

Name: Fifteen Top Key
Definition: A player takes five shots from the top of the key and 15 feet away from the basket

Name: Fantasy Points
Definition: The number of fantasy points a player accumulates Formula Pts: 1 Rebs: 1.2 Ast: 1.5 Stl: 3 Blocks: 3 TO: -1

Name: Frequency
Definition: The number of events that occur that fit the specified criteria based on the number of events overall

Name: Front Court Touches
Definition: The number of touches made by a player or team in the front court

Name: Free Throw Assists
Definition: A player is awarded a free throw assist if they passed the ball to a player who drew a shooting foul within one dribble of receiving the pass

Name: Free Throw Frequency
Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team shoots free throws as the result of a foul

Name: Free Throw Percentage
Definition: The percentage of free throw attempts that a player or team has made Formula (FTM)/(FTA)

Name: Free Throws Attempted
Definition: The number of free throws that a player or team has attempted

Name: Free Throw Attempt Rate
Definition: The number of free throw attempts a team shoots in comparison to the number of field goal attempts that team shoots Formula (FTA)/(FGA)

Name: Free Throws Made
Definition: The number of free throws that a player or team has made

Name: Games
Definition: The number of games a player or team played where a specified criteria occured

Name: Games Played
Definition: The number of games played

Name: Hand Length (inches)
Definition: Length of the Prospect's hand in inches. The measurement is taken from the bottom of the player's palm to the tip of his middle finger

Name: Hand Width (inches)
Definition: Width of the Prospects hand in inches. The measurement is taken from the player's outstretched hand from the tip of the thumb to tip of the pinky finger

Name: Height with Shoes
Definition: Height of the player while wearing shoes

Name: Height without Shoes
Definition: Height of the player without wearing shoes

Name: Helped Blocks
Definition: The number of blocks a defensive player recorded on a different defensive player than the one he was matched up with

Name: Helped Blocks Received
Definition: The number of times an offensive player’s shot was blocked by a different defensive player than the one he was matched up with

Name: Losses
Definition: The number of games lost by a player or team

Name: Lane Agility (seconds)
Definition: The time result of the drill that measures lateral quickness and the player's agility

Name: Loose Balls Recovered
Definition: The number of times a player or team gains sole possession of a live ball that is not in the control of either team

Name: Max Bench Press (repetitions)
Definition: The number of bench press repetitions at 185 lbs

Name: Max Vertical Leap (inches)
Definition: The vertical leap of a player with a few steps to start and gather his leap

Name: Minutes Played
Definition: The number of minutes played by a player or team

Name: NBA Break Left
Definition: A player takes five shots from the left break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

Name: NBA Break Right
Definition: A player takes five shots from the right break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

Name: NBA Corner Left
Definition: A player takes five shots from the left corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

Name: NBA Corner Right
Definition: A player takes five shots from the right corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

Name: NBA Top Key
Definition: A player takes five shots from top of the key. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

Name: Net Rating
Definition: Measures a team's point differential per 100 possessions. On player level this statistic is the team's point differential per 100 possessions while he is on court. Formula OFFRTG - DEFRTG

Name: Off Dribble College Break Left
Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from the left break area of the court. The shot is from about the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: Off Dribble College Break Right
Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from the right break area of the court. The shot is from about the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: Off Dribble College Top Key
Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from the top of the key. The shot is from about the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

Name: Off Dribble Fifteen Break Left
Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from 15 feet away from the basket on the left break area of the court

Name: Off Dribble FIfteen Break Right
Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from 15 feet away from the basket on the right break area of the court

Name: Off Dribble Fifteen Top Key
Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from 15 feet out at the top of the key

Name: Offensive Fouls
Definition: The number of offensive fouls an offensive player committed while being guarded by a specific defensive player

Name: Offensive Matchup Percentage
Definition: The percentage of an offensive player’s overall possessions where he was guarded by a specific defensive player

Name: Offensive Rating
Definition: Measures a team's points scored per 100 possessions. On a player level this statistic is team points scored per 100 possessions while he is on court Formula 100*((Points)/(POSS)

Name: On The Move College
Definition: 35 seconds to attempt as many shots as time allows from college 3-pt range (20 ft. 9 in.) while moving between spots (corners and elbows from both sides)

Name: On The Move Fifteen
Definition: 35 seconds to attempt as many shots as time allows from 15 feet while moving between spots (corners and elbows from both sides)

Name: Opponent Second Chance Points
Definition: The number of points an opposing player or team scores on a possession when the opposing team rebounds the ball on offense

Name: Opponent 2nd Chance Points
Definition: The number of points an opposing player or team scores on possessions where the opposing team rebounds the ball on offense

Name: Opponent Three Point Percentage
Definition: The percentage of 3 point attempts that are made by an opponent

Name: Opponent Three Point Attempted
Definition: The number of 3 point field goals attempted by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Three Point Made
Definition: The number of 3 point field goals made by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Assists
Definition: Number of times an opponent has registered an assist

Name: Opponent Blocked Shots
Definition: Number of times an opponent has registered a block on the shot of a player or team

Name: Opponent Blocks Against
Definition: An opponent's number of shot attempts that are blocked

Name: Opponent Defensive Rebounds
Definition: An opponent's number of defensive rebounds collected

Name: Opponent Effective Field Goal Percentage
Definition: An opponent's field goal percentage that is adjusted for made 3 pointers being 1.5 times more valuable than a 2 point shot Formula ((FGM + (0.5 * 3PM))/FGA

Name: Opponent Fast Break Points
Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team while on a fast break

Name: Opponent Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The percentage of field goal attempts that are made by an opponent

Name: Opponent Field Goals Attempted
Definition: An opponent's number of field goals attempted

Name: Opponent Field Goals Made
Definition: An opponent's number of field goals made

Name: Opponent Free Throw Percentage
Definition: The percentage of free throw attempts that are made by an opponent

Name: Opponent Free Throw Attempted
Definition: An opponent's number of free throws attempted

Name: Opponent Free Throw Attempt Rate
Definition: The number of free throw attempts a player or team allows in comparison to the number of shot attempts that player or team allows Formula (Opp FTA)/(Opp FGA)

Name: Opponent Free Throw Made
Definition: An opponent's number of free throws made

Name: Opponent Offensive Rebounds
Definition: The number of offensive rebounds obtained by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Offensive Rebounding Percentage
Definition: The percentage of available offensive rebounds an opponent obtains while a specific player is on the court

Name: Opponent Personal Fouls
Definition: The number of personal fouls committed by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Personal Fouls Drawn
Definition: The number of personal fouls drawn by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Points in the Paint
Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team in the paint

Name: Opponent Points
Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Points off Turnovers
Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team following a turnover

Name: Opponent Total Rebounds
Definition: The number of total rebounds obtained by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Steals
Definition: The number of steals obtained by an opposing player or team

Name: Opponent Turnovers
Definition: The number of times an opponent on offense loses the ball to the defense

Name: Opponent Turnover Percentage
Definition: The number of turnovers an opponent averages per 100 of their own possessions

Name: Offensive Rebounds
Definition: The number of rebounds a player or team has collected while they were on offense

Name: Offensive Rebound Chance Percentage
Definition: The percentage of offensive rebounds a player or team recovers compared to the number of offensive rebounding chances Formula (OREB)/(OREB Chances)

Name: Offensive Rebound Chances
Definition: When on offense, a player has a offensive rebound chance if they are the closest player to the ball at any point in time between when the ball has crossed below the rim to when it is fully rebounded

Name: Offensive Rebounding Percentage
Definition: The percentage of available offensive rebounds a player or team obtains while on the floor

Name: Pace
Definition: The number of possessions per 48 minutes for a team or player.
Any touch were the player receives the ball inside the 3-second lane

Name: Paint Touch Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on touches in the paint

Name: Paint Touch Points
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on touches in the paint

Name: Passes
Definition: The number of passes made to or received from the given player or team

Name: Pass Percentage
Definition: Percentage of times a player passes

Name: Passes Made
Definition: The number of total passes made by a player or team per game

Name: Passes Received
Definition: The number of total passes received by a player or team per game
Passes by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

Name: Percentile
Definition: A player or team's points per possession ranked against the rest of the league. The percentage value is the percent of eligible players with an inferior points per possession than the selected player or team. *10 Possession minimum

Name: Personal Fouls
Definition: The number of personal fouls a player or team committed

Name: Personal Fouls Drawn
Definition: The number of personal fouls that are drawn by a player or team

Name: Player Impact Estimate
Definition: PIE measures a player's overall statistical contribution against the total statistics in games they play in. PIE yields results which are comparable to other advanced statistics (e.g. PER) using a simple formula. Formula (PTS + FGM + FTM - FGA - FTA + DREB + (.5 * OREB) + AST + STL + (.5 * BLK) - PF - TO) / (GmPTS + GmFGM + GmFTM - GmFGA - GmFTA + GmDREB + (.5 * GmOREB) + GmAST + GmSTL + (.5 * GmBLK) - GmPF - GmTO)

Name: Points In The Paint
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team in the paint
Points scored by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

Name: Player Points Difference
Definition: An offensive player’s Points per 100 Possessions in a specific matchup compared to his season average Points per 100 Possessions. Formula 100*(Matchup Player Points/Matchup Possessions) – Player’s Season Average Points per 100 Possessions

Name: Possessions
Definition: The number of possessions played by a player or team. Please note: an Offensive Rebound does not create another possession, it simply makes the existing possession longer.

Name: Post Touch Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on touches in the post

Name: Post Touch Points
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on touches in the post

Name: Post Touches
Definition: The number of touches made by a player or team in the post

Name: Potential Assists
Definition: Any pass to a teammate who shoots within 1 dribble of receiving the ball

Name: Points Per Possession
Definition: The number of points a player or team scores per possession

Name: Points
Definition: The number of points scored

Name: Points off Turnovers
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team following an opponent's turnover

Name: Points per Elbow Touch
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per elbow touch

Name: Points per Paint Touch
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per paint touch

Name: Points per Post Touch
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per post touch

Name: Points per Touch
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per touch

Name: Points Percentage
Definition: Percentage of points scored

Name: Pull Up Field Goal Percentage
Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on Pull Up shots

Name: Pull Up Points
Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on Pull Up shots

Name: Rebounds
Definition: A rebound occurs when a player recovers the ball after a missed shot. This statistic is the number of total rebounds a player or team has collected on either offense or defense

Name: Rebound Chance Percentage
Definition: The percentage of rebounds a player or team recovers compared to the number of rebounding chances Formula (REB)/(REB Chances)

Name: Rebound Chances
Definition: A player has a rebound chance if they are the closest player to the ball at any point in time between when the ball has crossed below the rim to when it is fully rebounded

Name: Rebounding Percentage
Definition: The percentage of available rebounds a player or team grabbed while on the floor

Name: Screen Assists
Definition: The number of times an offensive player or team sets a screen for a teammate that directly leads to a made field goal by that teammate

Name: Score Frequency
Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team scores at least 1 point

Name: Secondary Assist
Definition: A player is awarded a secondary assist if they passed the ball to a player who recorded an assist within 1 second and without dribbling
Any shot with distance within 5 feet of the basket

Name: Shooting Foul Frequency
Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team shoots free throws as the result of a shooting foul

Name: Shooting Fouls
Definition: The number of shooting fouls a defensive player committed against his matchups
Shooting Fouls Drawn by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

Name: Shuttle Run (seconds)
Definition: The time result of the drill that measures a player's agility and ability to change directions

Name: Standing Reach
Definition: The reach of the player while standing still. The player reaches straight up to his highest point

Name: Standing Vertical Leap (inches)
Definition: The vertical leap of a player with no running start

Name: Steals
Definition: Number of times a defensive player or team takes the ball from a player on offense, causing a turnover

Name: Steals Percentage
Definition: The percentage of a team's steals that a player has while on the court

Name: Team Points Difference
Definition: An offensive player’s Team Points per 100 Possessions in a specific matchup compared to their season average Points per 100 Possessions. Formula 100*(Matchup Team Points/Matchup Possessions) – Team’s Season Average Points per 100 Possessions

Name: Team Points Per 100 Possessions (on an event)
Definition: Points scored by the team on possessions where there is an event for that player, divided by the number of unique possessions where there is an event for that player, multiplied by 100

Name: Triple Doubles
Definition: The number of triple-doubles (double-digit number total in three of the five categories in a game) a player achieves

Name: Three Quarter Sprint (seconds)
Definition: The time result of the drill where a player is timed in a sprint from the baseline to 3/4th the length of the court

Name: Time of Possession
Definition: The number of minutes that a player or team possesses the ball

Name: Turnover Frequency
Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team commits a turnover

Name: Turnover Ratio
Definition: The number of turnovers a player or team averages per 100 possessions used Formula (TO * 100) / (POSS)

Name: Touches
Definition: The number of times a player or team touches and posseses the ball during the game

Name: Turnovers
Definition: A turnover occurs when the player or team on offense loses the ball to the defense

Name: Turnover Percentage
Definition: Percentage of plays that end in a player or team's turnover
Effective Field Goal Percentage on shots off that event type
Points scored by the player off that event type

Name: True Shooting Percentage
Definition: A shooting percentage that factors in the value of three-point field goals and free throws in addition to conventional two-point field goals Formula Points/ [2*(Field Goals Attempted+0.44*Free Throws Attempted)]

Name: Uncontested Defensive Rebounds
Definition: The number of defensive rebounds gathered by a player or team while no opponent is within 3.5 feet

Name: Uncontested Offensive Rebounds
Definition: The number of offensive rebounds gathered by a player or team while no opponent is within 3.5 feet

Name: Uncontested Rebounds
Definition: The number of rebounds gathered by a player or team while no opponent is within 3.5 feet

Name: Usage Percentage
Definition: The percentage of team plays used by a player when he is on the floor Formula (FGA + Possession Ending FTA + TO) / POSS

Name: Wins
Definition: The number of games won by a player or team

Name: Win Percentage
Definition: The percentage of games played that a player or team has won Formula (W)/(GP)

Name: Wingspan
Definition: The player stretches his arms horizontally and a measure is made from the tip of his left hand to the tip of his right hand
